text: @SenTomCotton No damn question at all.  It originated at their Cat 1 Lab in Wuhan and is distributed by the PLA at the CCP's Order. They have realized that depopulating the whole world, leaving them as the sole provider is the only way to achieve Supremacy. Now they're trying to keep safe.
